pageContext.claim: “We've gotten rid of a lot of different elements of Obamacare. We had it beaten, but we got no Democrat votes. Not one. And we had it repealed and replaced, but essentially we've dismantled it. We got rid of so much and so many bad elements of it. It's been brought down to size.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump and congressional Republicans did essentially eliminate the individual mandate but the rest of the law remains largely intact.
